message:
As the original email announcement has stated, only deb and rpm distros are targeted. 
Then, only those who use glibc and link sshd to libsystemd, and libsystemd to liblzma for sd_notify. 

Alpine, Arch, NixOS, Void, and so on should all be fine. 




Imagine the face that they make, once they wake up tomorrow to this issue. 
Sober in a second.
